scripts.new-migration: node -e "if (!process.argv[1]) throw new Error('Please provide a name for the migration'); const n = `migrations/${(new Date()).toISOString().replace(/\.[\d]+Z$/, '').replace(/[^\d]/g, '')}_${process.argv[1]}.sql`; require('fs').writeFileSync(n, ''); console.info(`Created ${n}`);"
